content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"General Guidelines\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The main goal of this training is to provide the members of EPAM Google team with guidelines necessary to successful performance.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. During the Term of Assignment\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please remember, EPAM is your employer, and therefore all performance related questions, concerns, and feedback should be addressed with your EPAM Manager, and not with any Google representative. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Performance management\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": should be done through EPAM's system and team. You should not use Google's performance management and tracking tools.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have questions that are not project or assignment based (i.e. questions about compensation, employment agreements, changing projects, assignment, etc.) those questions should be directed to the EPAM Manager only to address. These and other non-project related issues are not topics for EPAM employees to discuss or address with the customer.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any concerns regarding your workload you should contact your EPAM Manager. You should not request recommendations (such as on Linked-in, or for other personal or professional purposes), from Google representatives, in connection with your provision of services to Google on this assignment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Tenure at Google:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM employees should not request or initiate any discussion regarding tenure on Google assignment with Google representatives. EPAM employees with questions regarding the term of any assignment should contact their EPAM Manager for clarification.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compensation/Pay:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM employees should address any concerns with pay or benefits only to their EPAM Manager and not to any Google representative.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Confidentiality of Assignment and Information:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM employees' assignments to the Google account are confidential and not to be disclosed outside of EPAM. This means that your assignment should not appear on any resume, or any Linked-In or other public platform; you should simply represent yourself as an EPAM employee. You should also not speak about your assignment, or EPAM's work with Google, outside of EPAM. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM employees should never share confidential or Personally Identifiable Information (PII). Even if you have information which is not explicitly noted as confidential or PII, it is highly recommended to follow the 'on a need to know basis' rule when sharing any type of Google related information. It is forbidden for EPAM employees to conduct sales/business development activities, to provide unsolicited resumes to Google managers (for existing or new projects) or soliciting employees / workers from other companies to join EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Misconduct:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you witness or become aware of any conduct that would violate these rules, the EPAM Code of Conduct, or any other EPAM workplace policy or rule while on assignment at Google, by another EPAM employee, a Google employee, or any other third party, you must immediately notify your EPAM Manager and EPAM HR representative;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Time off or leave of absence:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM employees should inform their EPAM Managers about any time off / vacation / sick time / leave of absence and follow the EPAM at Google Policy (Time off, Customer's holidays and others) as well as EPAM Employee Handbook policies.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Communication while at work:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM expects that everyone practices professional conduct while at work. All your interactions with other EPAM colleagues, temps/vendors and Google employees should be professional, however informal you may perceive the work environment to be. Please also act accordingly at any team events/celebrations.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please be respectful to others at the workplace by being cooperative and inclusive to individuals with different backgrounds, nationalities and language skills. When communicating in a group setting we ask that you use the common language understood by everyone around you to foster an inclusive atmosphere for international teams. As EPAM keeps growing as an international company, our teams become more diverse and it is vital that all our employees will be working in an inclusive atmosphere.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please communicate with your customers, Google employees using a Consulting approach – listen carefully, be active and initiative, be involved, avoid conflicts of interests and follow the customer's process (policies, confidentiality, time reporting and so on).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Training\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is responsible for the training and development needs of its employees. Please discuss your career development plan, and any certifications or supplemental training courses with your EPAM Manager. Google will provide training only if it is specific to Google products or processes and only if it is required for the role you are performing on this project.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. Meetings, e-mails\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Offsite & Team meetings:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM employees may attend Google sponsored events when:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"- events are marked as “social” or “with no restrictions” to attend for participants\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"- if the meeting is required for a work assignment\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"- or the attendance has been specifically approved by an EPAM Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Business Cards:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM employees are not eligible to have Google printed business cards.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use of Google's Mailbox / Internet:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM employees may not use a Google email account for personal needs, visiting web sites that not related to work duties at Google is strongly not recommended.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Signatures in email body:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM employees should make sure any email signature indicates they are a vendor on assignment at Google. EPAM employees assigned to Google projects will identify their employer in their customer's email signature line. Please use the following format and update your signature in @\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://google.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"google.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" account:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b25f39d2-3ad3-431a-b62e-0fa1b60278db/image2018-9-6_17-38-51.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":610,\"height\":112}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4. GOOGLE Amenities and BRINGING GUESTS TO GOOGLE\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Temporary workers, vendors, and contractors may have access to some perks (if available to you at your location) while on assignment at Google. Please follow Google's Policy and do not abuse these privileges.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Employees are not allowed to bring personal guests to Google at any time. This policy includes, but is not limited to, guests brought onsite for meals or taking meal out of Google offices.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Should your case be considered as a business necessity, please verify it with\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFBGOOGAMs@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Google Account Managers at EPAM\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". According to the Google Visitor Policy, a person with a guest badge should be supervised at all times.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5. Dressing at the Workplace:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"However informal the environment at Google may be, the expectation is that we always dress professionally. Please dress only in smart casual or business casual wear and follow recommendations from EPAM managers as conditions may vary. General suggestions are:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1223c394-c2d9-411d-b933-edb3e6ce4256/image2018-9-26_13-1-31.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":704,\"height\":390}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6. Public statements / Social media / Photography \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ensure you understand EPAM's policy on Social Media, (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/USA/2018-allcities/expectations-of-you.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/USA/2018-allcities/expectations-of-you.html\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") in addition to Google's requirements.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not share any information regarding Google in public, in any form, without the prior and explicit approval from your EPAM Delivery or Account Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not mention the business relationship between EPAM and Google without the prior and explicit approval of your EPAM Delivery or Account Manager (this includes any mention of your relationship with Google on social networks like Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, etc.).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not participate in any conferences or post any articles regarding your work or relationship with Google without the prior and explicit approval of your EPAM Delivery or Account Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not take photographs of the Google office or post them on any internal or external forums. Photography is allowed only in common areas like lobby or outside the buildings - comply with Google security staff requests that you to not use your camera, even if in public areas. If asked by security staff to take camera away even in common areas, comply with the request.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
